mapper.select: SELECT a.nSeqAdmin, a.Id, a.Password, a.Name, a.Phone, a.entityType, a.dtLastLogin, a.company_id, r.role_name AS roleName, c.CompanyName as companyName FROM admin a LEFT JOIN role r ON r.role_id = a.role_id left join company c on a.company_id = c.nSeqCompany WHERE 1 = 1 and a.Id = #{Id} AND a.bActive = 1
